assessment_intent: This question assesses the student's ability to apply geometric theorems related to circles, specifically the angle subtended by a diameter at any point on the circumference and the angle between a tangent and a chord, to calculate an unknown angle in a given diagram.

concepts.name: Angle in a semicircle is a right angle
Angle between tangent and chord through the point of contact is equal to the angle in the alternate segment
Sum of angles in a triangle
